sentences: Closed 'informal informal' discussions on mechanisms were held throughout the day and late into the night with the aim of seeking further convergence on the text.
By late evening, it is understood that while there had been steady progress in 'cleaning up the text,' key decisions on many of the core issues have yet to be taken.
The contact group on mechanisms will meet on Saturday morning to receive feedback on the informal discussions.
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
